summary: This is a heavy Wip Mod.It adds more NPCs, Furnishings and Items.
descriptionHtml:
--UPDATE--
The file will not be avalible to the public, only to people who are helping and/or testing!
Hello, I have decided to continue this mod and is asking for help and/or Testers.
I have created a small list of things that I or other people have suggested :
• (Sword) Darasuum Kote [Me]
• (Character) Court Wizard’s Apprentice[dankeekong]
If you have any Other suggestions please post in the Additions Thread in the forums section.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So Far it adds:
-A Cook (No dialogue)
-More Thrones
And much more soon to come.
Notes

- More Pictures will be added soon
- PLease let me know in the comments if there are any bugs.
Thanks,
OBODAHOBO15
author: OBODAHOBO15
